name: OG: Lord of the Rings Strategies
name_original: OG: Lord of the Rings Strategies
description:
OG is for Old Game. I made this game with GameMaker 6 when I was about 11.

Send out your good or evil units to overcome the enemy's base!

TitleLord of the Rings StrategiesEstimated Release Date2006?My Age at the Time11?EngineGameMaker 6.0

I dare you to post some of your old games, add the "og" tag, and link to them in the comments below.
